title: .zarr Inputs
description: Schema to validate inputs for .zarr data extraction process

watershed_name.description: Name of watershed to use in path when creating DSS file

data_variables.description: Gridded dataset variables to extract from zarr datasets when pulling data

zarr_s3_bucket.description: s3 URI for zarr data to extract

geojson_s3_path.description: s3 URI for geojson determining spatial extent of extraction area

start_date.description: start date for period of interest, in YYYY-mm-dd format

end_date.description: end date for period of interest, in YYYY-mm-dd format
